pages.text: $(li)Patterns can be used to customize your Banners, Flags and Elytras.$(br)$(li)To apply a Pattern in one of those items, you will need a Pattern, a Dye and a Loom.$(br)$(li)A Loom is used to apply Patterns on Banners, Flags and Elytras.
pages.title: Patterns

pages.text: $(li)First, right click the Loom to open a new GUI.$(br)$(li)Now, insert the Pattern, Dye and the item to customize.$(br)$(li)Finally take the item generated in the output slot.
$(li)A Pattern of a Daisy which can be used to customize your Elytras, Banners and Flags.$(br)$(li)It can be crafted with Paper and Daisy.
pages.title: Pattern Flower Charge

pages.text: $(li)A Pattern of a Creeper which can be used to customize your Elytras, Banners and Flags.$(br)$(li)It can be crafted with Paper and Creeper Head.
pages.title: Pattern Creeper Ch...

pages.text: $(li)A Pattern of a Wither Skull and crossbones which can be used to customize your Elytras, Banners and Flags.$(br)$(li)It can be crafted with Paper and Wither Skull.
pages.title: Pattern Skull

pages.text: $(li)A Pattern of the Mojang Studios logo which can be used to customize your Elytras, Banners and Flags.$(br)$(li)It can be crafted with Paper and Enchanted Golden Apple.
pages.title: Pattern Mojang

pages.text: $(li)A Pattern of a Cube Shaped Earth which can be used to customize your Elytras, Banners and Flags.$(br)$(li)It can be traded with a Cartographer.
pages.title: Pattern Globe

pages.text: $(li)A Pattern of Piglin Snout which can be used to customize your Elytras, Banners and Flags.$(br)$(li)It can be found in generated Chests in the Bastion Remmants.
pages.title: Pattern Snout

pages.text: $(li)A Pattern of a Bear which can be used to customize your Elytras, Banners and Flags.$(br)$(li)It can be crafted with Paper and Hair of Bear.
pages.title: Pattern Bear

pages.text: Insert a picture of the Banner / Flag
$(li)A Pattern of a Star Cross which can be used to customize your Elytras, Banners and Flags.$(br)$(li)It can be crafted with a Paper and a Kangaroo Hide.
